entityId.localType: National Archives of Australia Reference Number

identity.entityId: A884, A650 PART 1 and A884, A650 PART 2

nameEntry.part: Transfer of light coloured children (octoroons, quadroons, etc.) from Northern Territory to southern states

biogHist.abstract: Transfer of light coloured children (octoroons, quadroons, etc.) from Northern Territory to southern states is a file held by the National Archives of Australia. The file is divided into 2 parts - Part 1 (1952-58) and Part 2 (1958-59). These files have been digitised and are available to view online.
